articles.title: Mars to come closest to Earth in 15 years next month - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Every 15 or 17 years, opposition occurs within a few weeks of Mars’ perihelion - the point in its orbit when it is closest to the Sun.
articles.content:
Star gazers could have a good view of the Red Planet next month as Mars is set to come to the closest point to Earth since 2003 when it reaches opposition with the Sun in late July.

articles.title: ‘Indians are so good at mathematics and physics’: When Stephen Hawking came to India - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Scientist Stephen Hawking made a 16-day trip to India in 2001, visiting Mumbai and New Delhi. During the visit, he met then president KR Narayanan.
articles.content:
It was January 2001 when British physicist Stephen Hawking came to India for the first time, later describing the 16-day long tour as magnificent.
